WorkItem.Description:
Hello,
thanks for this great tool first.
I've got a question to the "rename folders"-function in the cutom updates generator of the WPP.
I was trying to use the path variable %programfiles(x86)%\folder\folder to rename a folder, but this doesn't seem to work. If i use the absolute path c:\program files (x86) it worked. I saw a using of variables like this in some WPP-pdf-document for the "execute a file"-function and so i thought they can be used to renam directorys too.

Comments.Message: Modified the method to properly expand the path %ProgramFiles(x86)%
